transcript.text: Hi Chris! We’re running a great promotion on our car insurance today. We offer comprehensive cover, roadside assistance, and super-fast claims. Let me tell you about all the features.
Our policy includes windscreen cover, theft cover, natural disaster cover, plus flexible payment options. You can pay monthly, quarterly, or yearly, whatever works best.
I already have car insurance though.
That’s totally fine, a lot of our customers switched from other providers. We’re very competitive and we’ve got a loyalty discount and a big no-claims bonus. Plus, our online reviews are excellent.
We can insure almost any car model and we have a standard excess that keeps premiums low. Our mobile app lets you view your policy and lodge claims anytime.
Okay, but I’m not sure I want to change anything right now.
If you sign up today, we can give you one month free. It’s a great deal and you probably won’t find better cover elsewhere.
I’d rather think about it first.
I understand, but the offer is limited. Why don’t we just take your details now and you can always cancel if you change your mind?
No, I’m okay for now. Thanks.
